entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as a character who has spilled sweets from his pocket and is trying to put them back in.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as the family that Fred is waving goodbye to.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is introduced as a character who gives a little gasp when Fred disappears.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as the one giving instructions to George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as a character who is helping carry the trunk into the flames.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one helping George carry the trunk.

relationships.description: Fred waves goodbye to the Dursleys before disappearing.
Mr. Weasley gives instructions to George.
